column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Free February by Comed brought me to the door.  The awesome collection was uplifting and made me feel better about the world.  Isn't that what art is supposed to do?  I enjoyed the modern wing the most.  The early American furniture
column3: and paintings really moved me.  It must have been growing up with parents who worshiped antiques.  It must have rubbed off on me as I truly appreciated this part of the museum.
